name: NDependTask
author: NDEPEND
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: viewname
inputs.label: Perspective Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Ndepend extension support the multi perspective feature, where you can have many perspectives of the same project.

inputs.name: ndproj
inputs.label: NDepend Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the NDepend project that contains your rules. The ndproj file is published as an artifact against the source directory. If it's not specified the default ones will be used.

inputs.name: excluded
inputs.label: Exclude assemblies that match the regex patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option is useful to exclude some dlls from the analysis, like the unit test ones.The regex patterns are separated by ;

inputs.name: Assemblies
inputs.label: Analyse only Assemblies referenced from the .ndproj
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option is useful to focus only on a subset of all assemblies built by the build DevOps build agent.

inputs.name: BuildGates
inputs.label: Stop the Build when at least one Quality Gate fails.
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option is useful to stop the Build when at least one Quality Gate fails.

inputs.name: PullRequest2
inputs.label: Annotate the code with the issues after a Pull Request build.
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option is useful to annotate the code with the issues after a Pull Request build.

inputs.name: BinariesOutput
inputs.label: Additional binaries output directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify an additional directory that contains your assemblies to analyze.

inputs.name: iscoverage
inputs.label: Get the coverage files from a specified directory.
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option is useful to specify the directory that contains your coverage files in case you use coverage tools other than the Microsoft ones.

inputs.name: coverage
inputs.label: Coverage Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the directory that contains your coverage files.
